content: fold rectangle as shown seam together side edges as shown using mattress stitch warning if the seam is too tight it may be difficult to get the scarf over your head i recommend not finishing off the seam until you try on the scarf so you can loosen the seaming if need be 2 for wearing slide the scarf over your head with the seam in front pull the top point over and down so you can see both the right and wrong sides of the scarf © copyright catrina mackenzie designs 2026 on ravelry com for personal and non-commercial use only 3
